product_name: FARMACYDeep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's alcohol-free Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner deeply exfoliates, unclogs pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
details: DetailsFeaturesThis refreshing, water-light daily toner contains a blend of salicylic acid, moringa water and papaya enzyme to help reduce shine and minimize the look of pores.Ideal for combination and oily skin, this formula effectively exfoliates and cleans pores to reveal a healthy-looking complexion.Key IngredientsSalicylic Acid (BHA) 2%: exfoliates, visibly cleans pores, draws out excess oil, and visibly refines textureMoringa Seed Extract and Moringa Water: refresh skin by removing visible impurities and dirtPapaya Enzymes: gently exfoliate and visibly clarify, revealing a fresh-looking complexionResearch ResultsBased on a 6-week consumer panel test ages 18 to 36 with combination or oily skin:100% agreed dirt, oil and impurities were fully removed95% agreed pores were deeply clean89% agreed skin looked visibly less oilyItem 2641627How To Use-Swipe onto a clean face, AM and/or PM, avoiding your eye area.-Do not rinse.-You may experience a slight tingling sensation.-Can be used daily in absence of irritation.-For daytime use, follow with sunscreen.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Arginine, Salicylic Acid, Lactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract, Moringa Oleifera Leaf Water, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Water, Chlorella Ferment, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Lactic Acid, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Gluconolactone, Maltodextrin, Glucose, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: -Swipe onto a clean face, AM and/or PM, avoiding your eye area.-Do not rinse.-You may experience a slight tingling sensation.-Can be used daily in absence of irritation.-For daytime use, follow with sunscreen.
ingredients: Sodium Benzoate.The list of ingredients is subject to change
